translations: n.（对古物的）发掘，挖掘；发掘现场； 挖洞，开凿

sentences.sentence: She worked on the excavation of a Mayan archaeological site.
sentences.translation: 她那时从事一个玛雅考古遗址的挖掘工作。

sentences.sentence: Hopefully, further excavation of Catalhoyuk will yield more clues.
sentences.translation: 但愿在加泰土丘的进一步挖掘能提供更多的线索。

sentences.sentence: About nine metres of the boat's length was recovered; one end lay beyond the excavation and had to be left.
sentences.translation: 找到了大约九米长的船身，其一端所在的地方超出挖掘范围，必须留在原地。
